certificates.name: Digitopia Competition (Software & AI)
certificates.text: Achieved the 2nd Phase in Software & AI track at the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology competition (First Edition).

certificates.name: Full Stack Web Development Diploma
certificates.text: Successfully completed a 200-hour intensive training course provided by WE (Telecom Egypt), covering modern web technologies.

certificates.name: IEEE Appreciation Certificate
certificates.text: Recognized for dedication, commitment, and valuable contribution to the IEEE IAET Student Branch.

certificates.name: Academic Excellence Award (1st Rank)
certificates.text: Awarded for achieving the 1st Rank in the First Year, Electronics and Communications Engineering Department at IAET.

certificates.name: Technical Committee Volunteer
certificates.text: Volunteered in the Technical Committee at IEEE IAET, completing all tasks in the 2024 season with dedication.

certificates.name: Career Directions Program
certificates.text: Completed the Offline Career Directions Program held by EFE Egypt, focusing on soft skills and career planning.
